## Set up chunk

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse) # general use package
library(lterdatasampler) # package of data frames

data(pie_crab) # importing pie crab data
```

# New section: exploratory visualization

```{r}
#| label: latitude size plot
# base layer for
ggplot(data = pie_crab, # use pie_crab data
       aes(x = latitude, # set x-axis
           y = size)) # set y-axis
```
